UPDATE cms_element
name = #{name},
code = #{code},
group_type = #{groupType},
client_version_a_id = #{clientVersionAId},
client_version_i_id = #{clientVersionIId},
client_version_a_remark = #{clientVersionARemark},
client_version_i_remark = #{clientVersionIRemark},
client_version_a_code = #{clientVersionACode},

create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
sort = #{sort},
